item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Anything was better than Ezra learning to play the bassoon..." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Katie MacAlister
item.description: "You do not interrupt a man when he is explaining his master plan after having been soundly defeated. Don't you watch any James Bond Movies?" -- Katie MacAlister

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "I'm telling you, it's fu**ing hard to be classy" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Katie MacAlister
item.description: "A compliment would be the last thing out of my mouth to a man who was so pigheaded that he could be served at a luau." -- Katie MacAlister

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Katie MacAlister
item.description: "Hey!” I said, indignation filling me. “I’m immortal! Doesn’t that mean I won’t get saggy boobs and gray hair? Because if it doesn’t mean that, I want a refund—" -- Katie MacAlister

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Katie MacAlister
item.description: "I've wanted you since the moment you tried to run me over. You are unlike any woman I have met before. You are strong, and courageous, and you do not suffer fools... " -- Katie MacAlister

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Katie MacAlister
item.description: "What's a friend for if not to face almost certain death with, eh?" -- Katie MacAlister

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Don't let the bastards grind you down." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "I want to be held and told my name. I want to be valued, in ways that I am not; I want to be more than valuable. I repeat my former name; remind myself of what I once could do, how others saw me. I want to steal something." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Nobody dies from the lack of sex. It's lack of love we die from." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Sue Monk Kidd
item.description: "All my life I've thought I needed someone to complete me, now I know I need to belong to myself." -- Sue Monk Kidd

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Sue Monk Kidd
item.description: "Yes, here I am returning, the woman who bore herself to the bottom and back. Who wanted to swim like dolphins, leaping waves and diving. Who wanted only to belong to herself." -- Sue Monk Kidd

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Sue Monk Kidd
item.description: "I didn't know then what I wanted, but the ache for it was palpable." -- Sue Monk Kidd

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Sue Monk Kidd
item.description: "If you aren't giving people something to talk about, you've become too dull." -- Sue Monk Kidd

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "This is how we court girls in America. We grab them and kiss them. And if they don't like it, we do it again, harder and longer, until they surrender. It saves us hours of witty repartee." -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "Darlin'...I know what you look like when you've been kissed." -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Naomi Neale
item.description: "Shut up and look holy!" -- Naomi Neale

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "When I want you to beg, I'll tell you." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description: "A book unopened alters not the ink on it's pages" -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "I want morning and noon and nightfall with you. I want your tears, your smiles, your kisses...the smell of your hair, the taste of your skin, the touch of your breath on my face. I want to see you in the final hour of my life...to lie in your arms as I take my last breath." -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "A sixty - eight, he wants you to go down on him but he won't return the favor. It would be sixty-nine but he owes you one." -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
Rochelle add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "The next time you face a room full of strangers . . . you might tell yourself that some of them are just friends waiting to be found." -- Lisa Kleypas

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Susan Wiggs
item.description: "When you're with the person you love, you're home." -- Susan Wiggs

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Mary Janice Davidson
item.description: "He said my name the way diabetics talked about hot fudge sundaes." -- Mary Janice Davidson

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by MaryJanice Davidson
item.description: "I mean, I wouldn't have wanted to be recognized. But I was kind of a prude about cheating on taxes, group sex, murder, and stuff." -- MaryJanice Davidson

item.title: Rochelle add a quote by Lisa Kleypas
item.description: "Amanda made an ironic and surprising discovery - her marriage to Jack had given her far more freedom than she had enjoyed as a single woman. Because of him, she now had the money and influence to do as she wished...and most important, she had a husband who encouraged her to do exactly as she pleased." -- Lisa Kleypas
